Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We identified both causative mutations in 686 patients from seven European centers .

| causative mutations |

I have identified "causative mutations" as the disease entity in the paragraph. However, it's important to note that "causative mutations" are not a specific disease but rather genetic variations that can lead to various diseases. The context of the paragraph suggests that these mutations are being studied in the context of some disease, but the text does not provide enough information to specify what those diseases might be.

| causative mutations |

I apologize for the confusion in my previous response.
